name: Naughty Present
description:
Santa Claus rewards those who behaved well with presents each year and leaves a mean surprise to anyone who did not. You are a small gift that musts find its way to your recipient! Not for the faint of heart!

Game created for Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam

CONTROLS 
A/D/Left arrow/Right arrow - move 
Up arrow/Space - jump 

If you can't play for some reason, you can watch whole gameplay on the youtube video (sorry for medium quality)

Authors:

  • Damian Pacholak
  • Grzegorz Kocik
  • Jeremiasz Kacprzak
  • Madzia Dytrych
  • Piotr Doan
